plot: We learn about the life of 13-year-old Swedish girl Rosa who fantasizes to be a pop star. She uses to explain her life to her fans by talking to a camera and also sings songs about her life...
plot_en: We learn about the life of 13-year-old Swedish girl Rosa who fantasizes to be a pop star. She uses to explain her life to her fans by talking to a camera and also sings songs about her life...
plot_es: We learn about the life of 13-year-old Swedish girl Rosa who fantasizes to be a pop star. She uses to explain her life to her fans by talking to a camera and also sings songs about her life...
title: Livet enligt Rosa
